query:
SELECT 
            w.start_time, 
            w.user_id,
            u.current_weight_kg,
            COALESCE(SUM(s.weight_kg * s.reps), 0) as volume,
            COUNT(s.id) as set_count
        FROM workouts w
        JOIN users u ON w.user_id = u.id
        LEFT JOIN sets s ON w.id = s.workout_id
        WHERE w.id = $1
        GROUP BY w.id, w.start_time, w.user_id, u.current_weight_kg
